entry.title: creating workflow CR to block/unblock employee in SAP MDG
entry.content:
Hi 

need help in creating workflow CR. i never worked on such requirement before and don't know either how to do and you such help in youtube and google for this requirement.
please guide me step by step what i have to do.


add the ability to block / unblock employee vendors through workflow. This needs to happen at general and company code level.

 

Create a new Workflow CR to Block/Unblock the Employee record.

Vendor type: Employee

Auth group: EMPL

 

Security: Security authorization to restrict based on the Geoâ€™s.

 

Below mentioned are the fields that should be allowed to be modified:

No.

SAP Field

Description

1

BUT000- XDELE

Archiving Flag

2

BUT000- XBLCK

Central Block

3

LFA1- LOEVM

Deletion Flag

4

LFA1- SPERR

Posting Block

5

LFA1- SPERM

Purch. block

6

LFB1- SPERR

Co.code post.block

7

LFB1- LOEVM

Co.Cde Deletion Flag

8

LFB1- ZAHLS

Payment Block

entry.title: Manage Business Partner-Edit Relationship but not General Data
entry.content:
Hi, 
I have a scenario (in SAP GTS e4H) where the business should be allowed to edit 'Relationships' of a Business Partner but not to change the 'General Data', as the  Business partners are coming from MDG (SAP System) and the persons are created locally in GTS.
Following is needed:
Create and edit person (Role BUP001) -> allowed
Assign contact person to a business partner (Organization)-> 'Relationships -> allowed
Change Business Partners (Organization) -> 'General Data' -> Not allowed
Would it help to restrict Change authorization to role 'BUP001' -> Authorization Object 'B_BUPA_RLT' -> ACTVT Change and RLTYP = 'BUP0001'
Thanks

entry.title: BP Legal Form changes not updating KNA1-GFORM
entry.content:
We are facing an issue in our MDG on S/4HANA landscape related to BP â†’ Customer (CVI) synchronization.

  • When a Business Partner is created with a Legal Form (Legal Status), the value is correctly updated into KNA1-GFORM during the initial creation.

  • However, when we later update the Legal Form in BP (through MDG Change Request), the change is not reflected in KNA1-GFORM after activation.

  • CVI customizing and mapping (Legal Status â†” Legal Form) is already in place and checked.

  • Other field updates (e.g., name, address) are working fine and replicating properly.

  • There are no errors in activation or replication logs  the update just doesnâ€™t reach KNA1.

Any guidance, experience, or reference to OSS notes would be very helpful.

entry.title: postable to all company codes for profit center
entry.content:
The field 'PCTRCCALL'-postable to company codes have to be set to blank value during creation of Profit center by File Upload.

I have created enhancment for Get_data of Profit center feeder class where i'm using set_property and making the field blank.

But once the CR is activated,i can see the Postable to all company codes is set to 'X'.

Any suggestion through which this can be achieved is highly appreciated.

entry.title: MDGMX - customer/Vendor Export data to S4hana
entry.content:
Good day,

We have a requirement where we need to export/migrate data from an old legacy ECC system to S4HANA. 
I have seen MDMGX can be used for finance data but can it be used for customer or vendor data?

Or is there alternative to migrate the data in question?

entry.title: MDG replication of field not successful
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I am newbie in Webservices and need some second opinions from you guys.

My Business Analyst told me that the field KNA1-RPMKR should be copied from source system to target system. We use the transaction DRFOUT to perform this.

No errors were found in SRT_MONI and DRFOUT as well.

Unfortunately, the field does not get copied even though it has a value in the source system.

The question is, should I ask for help from SAP since this standard class CL_MDG_BP_RPLCTRQ and standard method BP_SUITEBULK_REPL_REQ_IN also in SPROXY the service definition is SAP standard BusinessPartnerSUITEBulkReplic?

If not, then what will be my next step?

Please help.

Newguy_cloud

entry.title: Unable to Add EAN/ECP (MARA-EAN11) to Extended Data Source FDP_PP_MOR_DATA_LIST_SRV â€“ Value Returns
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am currently working in an SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud environment and am having trouble adding a master field to the extended data source FDP_PP_MOR_DATA_LIST_SRV.

My goal is to include the EAN/ECP field (MARA-EAN11) so that I can print it on a manufacturing label.

Hereâ€™s what Iâ€™ve done so far:

  1. I tried adding the field using Data Source Extensions in the Custom Fields app.
  2. The field appears as expected in the extended data source.
  3. However, when I test it in the output, the value always appears blank, even though the material master has a valid, up-to-date EAN code.

    Questions:

    • Has anyone successfully added the EAN/EPC field to this data source?
    • Is there a specific configuration or prerequisite I might be missing in S/4HANA Public Cloud?
    • Could this field be restricted or not available for this scenario by design?

      Any guidance or workaround would be greatly appreciated.

      Thanks in advance for your help!

      ASG.

       

      #S4HANACloud #Manufacturing #OutputManagement #PublicCloud #LabelPrinting #DataSourceExtension #CustomFieldsAndLogic #MaterialMaster #PP  #SAPExtensibility

entry.title: Same short desc & Long desc for different material codes it means duplicate ?
entry.content:

Now different material codes have same short desc & Long desc now we have doubt that it means the material is duplicated or it is normal scenario.
Any knowledge on this helpful.

MM (Materials Management) 

SAP Master Data Governance 

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition Master Data

entry.title: In Change logs One in between CR processing another CR changes appears
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

I noticed an one issue, For the material user is trying to extend more plants and sales org in NWBC using CR process. 

In the change document i noticed in between the One CR changes another CR no is showing with some changes on the same material with different CR. How this is possible Once the Final check approved after completing the changes related to the 1st CR then only the 2nd CR needs to process and the change log should appears in the change document right?

Can any one please explain how it's possible where i need to check the reason for this issue?

Thanks and Regards,

Radhakrishnan/P

entry.title: Duplicate Materials issue in large based companies
entry.content:
I recently joined in one company which give support to large industry.
After joining one issue came regarding materials duplication. Firstly, I checked all material codes which are unique with code no issue then I started checking with other technical fields I found some thousands of materials are created with same controlling fields. Then I shared the material codes with same controlling fields with end user and suggested which are not in use please enable flag in LVORM [MARA-LVORM].
Any other alternatives please comment below

entry.title: SAP MDG - Material - Class & characteristics
entry.content:
I have one requirement in material class and characteristics.

I have created one custom class in ZCL_MDG.

Inside the class I have created custom 2 characteristics :  1. Parent  , 2 Child.

User will enter the value in child manually, but for parent field I want to provide F4 help (the values of f4 help should come from custom table ) .

Can anyone help/ guide  me  regarding this.

SAP Master Data Governance , UI Web Dynpro ABAP ,  Data Management

entry.title: S/4 HANA Public Cloud_How to configure the process template when performing a BP mass update
entry.content: In the "Manage Mass Maintenance - BP" app on SAP Fiori, after creating a new project, I couldn't select any process template under the "Process Template" section. As a result, the "Start" button is not clickable. So, where is the process template configured, and how is it set up in SAP Fiori?

entry.title: Replicating material from a non-SAP system to the S/4HANA MDG system
entry.content:
Dear All

I have a project task to replicate material from non-SAP system to S/4HANA MDG system. Changes initiated in non-SAP system will trigger a CR getting automatically created and approved in MDG, along with appropriate mapping, error handling .

Gone through some information and see that ProductMDMBulkReplicateRequest_In can be used in S/4HANA MDG.

Below are the steps i can think of

- Configuring SOA services

- Request in the form of XML

- CR gets created and approved 

 

If any one came across a similar ask and implemented this, would you be able to share the process or steps i should consider to proceed on the task.

Ex: Apart from SOA configuration, any BADI implementation to be considered? for auto- CR creation and mapping 

 

 

regards

Chandra.

entry.title: Error in cross entity derivation for BP (USMD_RULE_SERVICE_CROSS_ET)
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I have a requirement where based on the relationship data entered by user during CR creation, I need to make an additional entry in relationship entity( BP_REL) and also update two custom fields in BP_CENTRL entity.

When the user create an entry in relationship tab in NWBC and press enter, i am using this  method IF_EX_USMD_RULE_SERVICE2~DERIVE of BADI USMD_RULE_SERVICE_CROSS_ET to read the changed entity 'BP_REL' and create an additional entry based on it but getting a dump due to error populated in standard method do_data_check->check_data.
I am getting this error after using WRITE_DATA method and it is resulting in ST22 dump- CX_USMD_WRITE_ERROR
Error message is USMD1A 061.

Kindly could you please help what could be the issue?
